TEXT.TITLE: STANWOOD CORP <SNW> 4TH QTR JAN 3
TEXT.BODY:
Shr loss 1.12 dlrs vs profit one cts
    Net loss 1.7 mln vs profit 8,000 dlrs
    Revs 31.8 mln vs 42.1 mln
    Year
    Shr loss 51 cts vs profit 57 cts

 Reuter
